TheRuler.Web
Class RestController

java.lang.Object
  TheRuler.Web.RestController

@Controller
public class RestController
extends Object

Controller for handling request for HTTP API.

Peter Gren

RestController

Method Detail

getGrammar

@RequestMapping(value="/rest/grammar",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/srgs+xml;charset=UTF-8")
@ResponseStatus(value=OK)
@ResponseBody
public String getGrammar(@RequestParam(value="grammarId")
                                                                    Long grammarId)
Return raw SRGS grammar.

Parameters:
grammarId - ID of grammar.
Returns:
Grammar with application/srgs+xml MIME type.

createGrammar

@RequestMapping(value="/rest/create-grammar",
                method=POST)
@ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
@ResponseBody
public Map<String,String> createGrammar(@RequestParam
                                                                                   String grammarName,
                                                                                   @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                   String grammarContent)
Creates new grammar with posted name and opitonal content.

Parameters:
grammarName - Name of created grammar.
grammarContent - SRGS Grammar content (optional).
Returns:
ID of created grammar in JSON variable grammarId.

deleteGrammar

@RequestMapping(value="/rest/delete-grammar",
                method=POST)
@ResponseStatus(value=OK)
@ResponseBody
public String deleteGrammar(@RequestParam
                                                                       Long grammarId)
Deletes grammar according to ID.

Parameters:
grammarId - ID of grammar.
Returns:
HTTP status.

createRule

@RequestMapping(value="/rest/create-rule",
                method=POST)
@ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
@ResponseBody
public String createRule(@RequestParam
                                                                    String ruleId,
                                                                    @RequestParam
                                                                    String content,
                                                                    @RequestParam
                                                                    Long grammarId)
Adds new rule with posted name into grammar with given ID.

Parameters:
ruleId - Rule ID.
content - Rule content.
grammarId - ID of grammar to insert the rule.
Returns:
HTTP status.

getRule

@RequestMapping(value="/rest/rule",
                produces="application/xml;charset=UTF-8")
@ResponseStatus(value=OK)
@ResponseBody
public String getRule(@RequestParam
                                                                 Long grammarId,
                                                                 @RequestParam
                                                                 String ruleId)
Retrieves rule from grammar.

Parameters:
grammarId - ID of grammar containg rule.
ruleId - ID of rule.
Returns:
Rule with MIME type application/xml.

deleteRule

@RequestMapping(value="/rest/delete-rule",
                method=POST)
@ResponseStatus(value=OK)
@ResponseBody
public String deleteRule(@RequestParam
                                                                    Long grammarId,
                                                                    @RequestParam
                                                                    String ruleId)
Deletes rule from grammar.

Parameters:
grammarId - ID of grammar containg rule.
ruleId - ID of rule.
Returns:
HTTP status.
